title: The Bear
description: The Bear He's an orphan at the start of a journey . . . a journey to survive. Thor, a mighty grizzly, and Muskwa, a motherless bear cub, become companions in the Canadian wilderness, going from one adventure to another, picking berries, fishing in rivers, encountering other animals of the forestâ€”all while two bear trappers are drawing nearer and nearer. . . .
author: James Oliver Curwood
